0.text: Innate: Whenever Wukong or his  clone damage an enemy  champion or  monster, he generates a stack of Strength of Stone for 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 10 times.
0.html: Innate: Whenever Wukong or his clone damage an enemy champion or monster, he generates a stack of Strength of Stone for 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 10 times.
markedPassages: clone
champion
monster

1.text: Strength of Stone: Wukong gains 5 − 9 (based on level)  bonus armor and  health regeneration equal to 0.35% of his maximum health, increased by 50% for each stack up to a maximum of 30 − 54 (based on level) bonus armor and 2.1% maximum health regeneration.
1.html: Strength of Stone: Wukong gains 5 − 9 (based on level)  bonus armor and  health regeneration equal to 0.35% of his maximum health, increased by 50% for each stack up to a maximum of 30 − 54 (based on level) bonus armor and 2.1% maximum health regeneration.
markedPassages: 5 − 9 (based on level)  bonus armor
bonus armor
health regeneration
30 − 54 (based on level) bonus armor

0.text: Active: Wukong empowers his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  bonus range, deal bonus physical damage, and inflict  armor reduction for 3 seconds.
0.html: Active: Wukong empowers his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, gain  bonus range, deal bonus physical damage, and inflict  armor reduction for 3 seconds.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
bonus range
armor reduction

1.text: Crushing Blow's cooldown is  reduced by 0.5 seconds whenever Wukong or his  clone damage an enemy.
1.html: Crushing Blow's cooldown is  reduced by 0.5 seconds whenever Wukong or his clone damage an enemy.
markedPassages: reduced
clone

2.text: Crushing Blow  resets Wukong's and his  clone's basic attack timer. Other abilities can be used during the attack's animation.
2.html: Crushing Blow resets Wukong's and his clone's basic attack timer. Other abilities can be used during the attack's animation.
markedPassages: resets
clone's

0.text: Active: Wukong enters  invisibility for 1 second and  dashes to the target location, leaving behind a  clone of himself at his casting position for 3.25 seconds.
0.html: Active: Wukong enters invisibility for 1 second and dashes to the target location, leaving behind a clone of himself at his casting position for 3.25 seconds.
markedPassages: invisibility
dashes
clone

1.text: The clone is  untargetable to allies and can basic attack autonomously, prioritizing the last enemy Wukong damaged. It can also gain the effects of  Crushing Blow and  Nimbus Strike's bonus attack speed, and casts  Cyclone whenever Wukong does.
1.html: The clone is untargetable to allies and can basic attack autonomously, prioritizing the last enemy Wukong damaged. It can also gain the effects of Crushing Blow and Nimbus Strike's bonus attack speed, and casts Cyclone whenever Wukong does.
markedPassages: untargetable
Crushing Blow
Nimbus Strike's
Cyclone

2.text: The clone deals reduced outgoing damage.

3.text: See Pets for more details about Wukong's clone. Wukong can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Warrior Trickster will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: See Pets for more details about Wukong's clone. Wukong can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Warrior Trickster will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Wukong  dashes to the target enemy's location and sends out  untargetable clones to strike up to two additional enemies near the target's location, dealing magic damage. Nimbus Strike deals 120% damage to  monsters.
0.html: Active: Wukong dashes to the target enemy's location and sends out untargetable clones to strike up to two additional enemies near the target's location, dealing magic damage. Nimbus Strike deals 120% damage to monsters.
markedPassages: dashes
untargetable
monsters

1.text: Upon arrival, Wukong gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
1.html: Upon arrival, Wukong gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

2.text: Crushing Blow can be cast during the dash.
2.html: Crushing Blow can be cast during the dash.
markedPassages: Crushing Blow

0.text: Active: Wukong spins his staff around for up to 2 seconds, becoming  ghosted and gaining  20% bonus movement speed. The staff deals physical damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies hit, and can  knock them up once for 0.6 seconds. Cyclone will not  knock up enemies who were already hit by either Wukong or his  clone within the same cast.
0.html: Active: Wukong spins his staff around for up to 2 seconds, becoming ghosted and gaining  20% bonus movement speed. The staff deals physical damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies hit, and can knock them up once for 0.6 seconds. Cyclone will not knock up enemies who were already hit by either Wukong or his clone within the same cast.
markedPassages: ghosted
20% bonus movement speed
knock them up
knock up
clone

1.text: Cyclone can be recast after 0.5 seconds within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or by casting another ability.
1.html: Cyclone can be recast after 0.5 seconds within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or by casting another ability.

2.text: Recast: Wukong ends Cyclone. After 1 second, he can cast Cyclone a second time within 8 seconds of the first cast.
2.html: Recast: Wukong ends Cyclone. After 1 second, he can cast Cyclone a second time within 8 seconds of the first cast.

3.text: Nimbus Strike's bonus attack speed duration is continuously refreshed while spinning.
3.html: Nimbus Strike's bonus attack speed duration is continuously refreshed while spinning.
markedPassages: Nimbus Strike's

4.text: Cyclone's damage is capped at 200 / 400 / 600 (based on level) per second against  monsters.
4.html: Cyclone's damage is capped at 200 / 400 / 600 (based on level) per second against monsters.
markedPassages: monsters

abilities.concerningText: Active: Wukong empowers his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  bonus range, deal bonus physical damage, and inflict  armor reduction for 3 seconds.
Active: Wukong empowers his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  bonus range, deal bonus physical damage, and inflict  armor reduction for 3 seconds.
Active: Wukong empowers his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  bonus range, deal bonus physical damage, and inflict  armor reduction for 3 seconds.
The clone deals reduced outgoing damage.

Active: Wukong  dashes to the target enemy's location and sends out  untargetable clones to strike up to two additional enemies near the target's location, dealing magic damage. Nimbus Strike deals 120% damage to  monsters.

Active: Wukong  dashes to the target enemy's location and sends out  untargetable clones to strike up to two additional enemies near the target's location, dealing magic damage. Nimbus Strike deals 120% damage to  monsters.
Upon arrival, Wukong gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.

Active: Wukong spins his staff around for up to 2 seconds, becoming  ghosted and gaining  20% bonus movement speed. The staff deals physical damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies hit, and can  knock them up once for 0.6 seconds. Cyclone will not  knock up enemies who were already hit by either Wukong or his  clone within the same cast.

The staff deals physical damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies hit, and can  knock them up once for 0.6 seconds. Cyclone will not  knock up enemies who were already hit by either Wukong or his  clone within the same cast.
